title: Controversy on SpectateFaker
body:
StarLordLucian is being a huge dick even with Faker himself saying to stop E-Stalking. For me, as a Korean fanboy, i feel kinda angered towards people like him.

Even the Co-Owner of Rito told him to stop but hey, he's a self-centered person.

replies.body: Tryndamere is insulting anyone who has had to deal with real stalking or bullying over the internet. It's an issue too, but not the problem with SpectateFaker. Challenger Ranked games are promoted by the LoL client and literally anyone can view this using a site like op.gg.
does faker ask his teammates and the enemies if they want their games to be streamed? he's done nothing wrong. he's doing the exact same thing as faker.

Not exactly.

Faker is streaming HIMSELF playing the game. It's similar, but there is a difference, and if spectatefaker was a true fan he'd respect Faker's wishes. 

If you're a fan of someone, and they ask you to not do something they already do for their fans, you need to respect that. You're hurting their business, and not respecting their wishes. That's not being a fan in the slightest.

idk whats happening here but idk, i think that anything to do with stalking shouldn't happen, but you should really listen to someone more experienced in this like tomato
